title: [1.7.10][ssp] Half Ores Mod ——什么?这矿才有一半?
author: abc3527527
txt_content:
本帖最后由 sb023612 于 2014-11-5 01:27 编辑 
神魔!?这矿肿么才有一半？这不科学！！！！{:10_503:}


原贴翻译:
Half Ores Mod was made to add a bit of realism to mining in Minecraft. What it does it makes a new block, half of an ore, for each ore that is worth less than the ore. This half ore block drops a certain amount of nuggets of the material. You can then craft the original material with 9 nuggets.  
一半的矿石MOD在minecraft里添加了一点现实感。它添加了一些新的方块，一半的矿石，一半的矿石价值低于普通矿石。你可以用9块合成原材料.

replies.author: xushenyaotian
replies.txt_content: 好坑啊！9个二分之一才等于一。。。
什么样的效果 不用冶炼的矿也就出一个吧？那要冶炼的矿正常出一个那这个一半的是出多少？
